abstract: Turkey's highest court rules in favor of Can Dundar and Erdem Gul, two journalists jailed on terrorism and espionage charges, in decision that will likely lead to their release.
lead_paragraph: The country’s highest court paved the way for the release of the journalists, who were jailed on terrorism and espionage charges.

headline.main: Turkey: Court Says Officials Violated Rights of 2 Journalists
headline.print_headline: Europe; Turkey: Court Says Officials Violated Rights of 2 Journalists

snippet: The country’s highest court paved the way for the release of the journalists, who were jailed on terrorism and espionage charges.
